Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Frame
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesFR-210B Instructions for Manufacturing HL Touring Frame. Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing the HL Touring Frame, Product Model 7. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by Work Center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Insert aluminum sheet MS-2341 into the T-85A framing tool.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Frame
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesFR-210B Instructions for Manufacturing HL Touring Frame. Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing the HL Touring Frame, Product Model 7. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by Work Center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Attach Trim Jig TJ-26 to the upper and lower right corners of the aluminum sheet.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Frame
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesFR-210B Instructions for Manufacturing HL Touring Frame. Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing the HL Touring Frame, Product Model 7. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by Work Center ID. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Using a router with a carbide tip 15, route the aluminum sheet following the jig carefully.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesFR-210B Instructions for Manufacturing HL Touring Frame. Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing the HL Touring Frame, Product Model 7. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by Work Center ID. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Attach a maximum of 20 frames to paint harness ensuring frames are not touching.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Frame
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesFR-210B Instructions for Manufacturing HL Touring Frame. Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing the HL Touring Frame, Product Model 7. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by Work Center ID. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Frame

Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Slide each spoke through the hub flange working in a clockwise direction.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: For each spoke, screw on the spoke nipple (NI-9522). Do not over tighten.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Place the wheel in the truing stand.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Pluck each spoke. The sound from each spoke should be consistent. Adjust as needed.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Inflate the tire tubeto one-quarter pressure.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Insert the valve stem through Rim RM-M823.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Tuck the tube into the tire ensuring there are no wrinkles or kinks.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Inflate the tube to half pressure.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Rear Wheel
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Spin the wheel and ensure the bead line is just above the rim.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-150C Instructions for Assembling Touring Front Wheel Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Front Wheel, Product Model 43. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Slide the stem onto the handlebar centering it over the knurled section.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Take care not to scratch the handlebar.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: The ends of the handlebar should turn toward the rear.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Attach the Pinch Bolt (Product Number PB-6109), Lock Washer 10 (Product Number LW-1210), and Lock Nut 7 (Product Number LN-1224) onto the stem.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Tighten the nut just enough to keep the handlebar from rotating in the stem. Do not over tighten.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Put a Flat Washer 1 (Product Number FW-1000) onto the stem bolt, and then insert the bolt down into the stem.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the LL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the LL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 47. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Thread the plug nut onto the stem bolt aligning it with the stem body as shown in illustration 4. Insert the stem down into the lock nut until the minimum insertion line marked on the stem is hidden inside the nut.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the HL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the HL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 48. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Put a Flat Washer 9 (Product Number FW-3400) onto the stem bolt, and then insert the bolt down into the stem.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the HL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the HL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 48. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Thread the plug nut onto the stem bolt aligning it with the stem body as shown in illustration 4. Insert the stem down into the lock nut until the minimum insertion line marked on the stem is hidden inside the nut.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the HL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the HL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 48. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Attach the grips.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Handlebars
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-190A Instructions for Manufacturing and Assembling the HL Touring Handlebars Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for manufacturing and assembling the HL Touring Handlebars, Product Model 48. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Inspect per specification FI-225.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Visually examine the pedal spindles to determine left and right pedals. The left and right pedals have different threading directions. It is important you identify them correctly.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Apply a small amount of grease to the left pedal and thread the pedal onto the left crank arm by hand.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: If the threads do not turn easily, back the spindle out and re-start.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Securely tighten the spindle against the crank arm using a small wrench.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Apply a small amount of grease to the right pedal and thread the pedal onto the right crank arm by hand.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: Touring Pedal
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: If the threads do not turn easily, back the spindle out and re-start.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-500 Instructions Assembling the Touring Pedal Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the Touring Pedal, Product Model 53. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Seat/Saddle
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-620 Instructions Assembling the LL Touring Seat Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the LL Touring Seat, Product Model 63. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Put the Seat post Lug (Product Number SL-0931) on the Seat Post (Product Number SP-2981).

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Seat/Saddle
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-620 Instructions Assembling the LL Touring Seat Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the LL Touring Seat, Product Model 63. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Insert the Pinch Bolt (Product Number PB-6109) and tighten until it is secure but still able to slide up or down the post as shown in illustration 6.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Seat/Saddle
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-620 Instructions Assembling the LL Touring Seat Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the LL Touring Seat, Product Model 63. Instructions are work center specific and are identified by work center ID. These instructions must be followed in the order presented. Deviation from the instructions is not permitted unless an authorized Change Order detailing the deviation is provided by the Engineering Manager.
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Attach the LL Seat (Product Number SE-T312) to the top of the Seat Post and tighten securely.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: LL Touring Seat/Saddle
Production.vProductModelInstructions.Instructions: Adventure Works CyclesWA-620 Instructions Assembling the LL Touring Seat Summary: This document contains manufacturing instructions for assembling the LL Touring Seat, Product Model 63. Production.vProductModelInstructions.Step: Insert the Pinch Bolt (Product Number PB-6109) and tighten until it is secure but still able to slide up or down the post. See illustration 6.

Production.vProductModelInstructions.Name: HL Touring Seat/Saddle
